mods.abstract: Truth Or Consequences game show from December 12, 1942, part 1. Hosted by Ralph Edwards with announcer Ed Herlihy and contestants Robert Fleming, Al Zudek, John Martin, Jean Steenhoff, David Bloom, and Beatrice Bloom (contestant names unconfirmed). Laura Dean Dutton, star of Broadway musical New Faces Of 1943, sings the Ivory Soap jingles. Sponsored by Ivory Soap.
